channel.title: Microformats on Josh Wood
channel.description: Recent content in Microformats on Josh Wood

item.title: Projects
item.author: j@joshix.com (Josh Wood)
item.description: Containers &c. Caddybox: The Caddy web server in a container Jxnu: Markdown source and Hugo configuration to build this site Plan 9 Discount: Plan 9 build support and documentation for David Parsons’s Discount, a compiler for the Markdown formatting syntax. Source for Discount and for my fork for Plan 9 build maintenance is available on GitHub. Mb (neé µb): Plan 9 tools for Twitter/StatusNet microblogging See also /n/sources/contrib/josh/ Penicillin farm: Old code covered in mold Carefully neglected to various stages of decomposition.
